territoryData.description: Upselling CRM licenses to existing clients

insights.title: Pipeline Gap Alert
insights.description: You need to generate $3,500,000 additional pipeline.
insights.details: Focus on EC/NP opportunities (30% conversion) and expand existing customer relationships for higher probability deals. Historical data shows that increasing account review frequency by 50% leads to 30% more expansion opportunities.
recommendations: Schedule account reviews with your top 10 customers
Prepare expansion proposals for accounts with >80% utilization
Engage partners to identify cross-sell opportunities

insights.title: Optimize Pipeline Mix
insights.description: Current NC/NP pipeline is $1,200,000 with only 12% conversion rate.

insights.title: Run Rate Expansion
insights.description: Run rate business at $1,800,000 provides stable base.

insights.title: Q1 Focus Areas
insights.description: Your Q1 target requires immediate action to ensure pipeline coverage.
